'''Amelia Carver''' is the daughter of [[Beatrice Carver]].

==History==
Amelia's mother had cancer, but she was unaware of this. She came to the hospital with her mother and complained about the hospital food.

Later, her mother decided to give her all the advice she would have given her over the years all at once. Then she told her daughter that she was dying.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
====[[Beatrice Carver]]====
Her mother was dying of cancer, but she didn't know this. She was upset at having her mother be in the hospital and unable to celebrate her birthday with her.

====Aunt Sue====
While her mother was hospitalized, she stayed with Aunt Sue, which she didn't like. According to Beatrice, Aunt Sue is lazy about personal hygiene, so she told Amelia she'd have to take the lead there.
